title: Vanguard FTSE Pacific Breaks Above 200-Day Moving Average - Bullish for VPL - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of the Vanguard FTSE Pacific ETF (Symbol: VPL) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $64.71, changing hands as high as $64.86 per share. Vanguard FTSE Pacific shares are currently trading up about 1% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of VPL shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
